tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE road_closures (
    closure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    closure_date DATE,
    closure_reason STRING,
    detour_route STRING,
    estimated_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
  closure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  closure_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE construction_detours (
  detour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  detour_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  detour_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  duration_hrs INT,
  detour_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
  closure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_name VARCHAR,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  reason VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE construction_detours (
  detour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  detour_name VARCHAR,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  construction_reason VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_issues (
  issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  issue_description TEXT,
  reported_by VARCHAR,
  report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    reason TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE detours (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    closure_id INT,
    detour_route VARCHAR(255),
    distance FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_events (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE accidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    accident_date DATE,
    reported_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
    closure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR(255),
    closure_reason TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE detours (
    detour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    origin_road VARCHAR(255),
    destination_road VARCHAR(255),
    detour_length FLOAT,
    detour_duration TIME
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE accidents (
    accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accident_date DATE,
    accident_location VARCHAR(255),
    accident_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE road_works (
    work_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    work_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)
